lead_paragraph: The Spanish champion Real Madrid appointed Bernd Schuster, a former German international player, as its new coach yesterday.The 47-year-old Schuster, coach of the Primera Liga team Getafe for the past two seasons, replaces Fabio Capello, who was fired at the end of June after leading the club to its first league title in four years.
